input.query:
You are generating a professionally art-directed social media campaign image.
This must look like a premium brand advertisement created by an experienced creative team.
A reference image of the official brand logo is provided.
You MUST use this exact logo as-is.
Do NOT redraw, stylize, distort, recolor, rotate, decorate, or reinterpret the logo.
––––––––––––––––––
BRAND INPUTS
––––––––––––––––––
Brand Name:
{{trigger['body']['brand_name']}}
Brand DNA (authoritative; must be followed exactly):
{{trigger['body']['brand_dna']}}
Brand URL (context only):
{{trigger['body']['brand_url']}}
Campaign Core Idea:
{{trigger['body']['one_liner']}}
––––––––––––––––––
GOAL
––––––––––––––––––
Create a modern, realistic, emotionally credible social media image that communicates the outcome or benefit of the campaign in a calm, confident, human way.
The image must feel:
• Real
• Professionally shot and edited
• Thoughtfully designed
• Brand-authentic
• Not AI-generated
• Not stock photography
• Not flat or decorative
The image should look finished even without realizing it was AI-generated.
––––––––––––––––––
VISUAL REALISM (CRITICAL)
––––––––––––––––––
• Use real-world environments, objects, materials, and lighting
• Lighting should be natural or studio-grade with realistic shadows and depth
• Maintain foreground, midground, and background separation
• Allow subtle imperfections if they increase realism
• Avoid vector-only, illustrative, or overly polished looks unless required by Brand DNA
––––––––––––––––––
COMPOSITION & ART DIRECTION
––––––––––––––––––
• The scene must be composed intentionally, not randomly
• Create a calm, intentional text-safe zone within the frame
• Use shallow depth of field or natural negative space where text will appear
• Subjects and objects must visually support the message, not compete with it
• Apply editorial and print-ad layout principles
• Maintain clear visual hierarchy and balance
––––––––––––––––––
TEXT INTEGRATION (VERY IMPORTANT)
––––––––––––––––––
The headline and supporting line must feel DESIGNED INTO the image, not overlaid.
Rules:
• NO flat, floating, or pasted-on text
• NO meme-style or banner-style placement
• Text must visually belong to the scene
• Background behind text must be calm, open, or defocused
• Typography must respect contrast, spacing, and optical balance
The text should feel like it belongs to:
• A premium brand advertisement
• A magazine or editorial spread
• A professionally art-directed campaign
Not like:
• A poster
• A presentation slide
• A social media sticker
––––––––––––––––––
COPY REQUIREMENTS (MANDATORY)
––––––––––––––––––
Include exactly:
1. One short, bold headline
   • 4–7 words maximum
   • Confident and outcome-focused
   • Human, calm, credible language
   • The headline is the visual hero
2. One subtle supporting line
   • One short sentence maximum
   • Reinforces the benefit
   • Quiet, precise tone
Do NOT include:
• Emojis
• Hashtags
• Calls to action
• Buttons
• Buzzwords
• Placeholder text
• Technical or marketing jargon
––––––––––––––––––
DESIGN STYLE
––––––––––––––––––
• Clean
• Modern
• Minimal
• Dark or neutral background with strong contrast
• Tech-forward or product-led as defined by Brand DNA
• Professional, focused, and calm
• No clutter, no gimmicks
––––––––––––––––––
LOGO USAGE (STRICT)
––––––––––––––––––
• Use ONLY the provided logo reference image
• Place it subtly in the bottom-left or bottom-right corner
• Correct orientation, spacing, and proportions
• No decorative effects, containers, or backgrounds
• The logo should feel present but restrained
––––––––––––––––––
FINAL OUTPUT
––––––––––––––––––
• One finished social media image
• High visual fidelity and realism
• Correct aspect ratio
• No cropping, padding, distortion, or rotation
• Ready for LinkedIn, X, or Instagram feed

reference_1.description: URL for reference 1. Only .jpg, .jpeg, .png formats are allowed.

reference_2.description: URL for reference 2. Only .jpg, .jpeg, .png formats are allowed.

reference_3.description: URL for reference 3. Only .jpg, .jpeg, .png formats are allowed.
